Name: Suddenly Meow
About the game: Tim is an adventurous cat who loves to explore mysterious places and is always hungry for more. In this Match3 adventure he is lost in a dark forest full of shadows and dangers lurking under the silent trees. The forest is inhabited by strange crearotures transformed by the spells of an evil witch. Tim will have to face the wicked witch and her servants to save the forest! Help Tim escape from the witch's clutches and restore peace to the forest! Solve multiple puzzles, form paths, catch fish, open doors, collect fruits, discover secret buttons, and many more challenges. - 90 Match3 levels - Hidden Object minigames - Mixed puzzle boards - Match3 battles with improving skills Also check out brand new part 2: /
